section.title: Certified Downloads
section.p: Currently, Apache MyFaces has no JSR-127 TCK certified releases.

section.title: Milestone Downloads
section.p: The following non-certified milestone releases are available. We feel confident that MyFaces has reached a production stable state. But keep in mind that these milestone releases are 'technology demonstrations' and not offered as JSF 1.1-compatible implementation.

section.title: Nightly Builds
section.p:
Automated builds of the latest source code. These bundles contain the latest code and should be used at your own risk.
Please report any issues using the binaries by following the instructions here.
